name: tkBacktracer

screenshots.caption: tkBacktracer showing a trace of a motor mount milling path.

short_description: tkBacktracer is a cross-platform interactive visualization tool to explore the tool motions in RS-274D "G-code" CNC files used in computer controlled milling and manufacturing.
